class.name: VSeparator
class.brief_description: A vertical line used for separating other controls.
class.description: A vertical separator used for separating other controls that are arranged [b]horizontally[/b]. [VSeparator] is purely visual and normally drawn as a [StyleBoxLine].

theme_items.theme_item: The width of the area covered by the separator. Effectively works like a minimum width.
The style for the separator line. Works best with [StyleBoxLine] (remember to enable [member StyleBoxLine.vertical]).
